title: Theme-Centered Science Literacy Integrated Education for Improving Early Childhood Healthy Lifestyle Habits

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and foundational awareness of daily health management
context.additional_context: Program developing scientific literacy and real-life application skills simultaneously through a curriculum themed on early childhood healthy lifestyle habits (PHBS), structured as blended learning combining theory and field practice

learning_goals: Learners can explain the scientific principles underlying young children’s healthy lifestyle habits (handwashing, healthy eating, oral hygiene, physical activity, waste management).
Learners can design and implement strategies to improve young children’s health behaviors using a theme-centered learning model.
Based on integrated scientific literacy, learners can establish and evaluate sustainable health practice plans.

resources: Early Childhood Health Behavior Observation Journal

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
